info.name: Polling API
info.description: A simple API, supporting user accounts, creating and voting in polls.

item.name: User management

request.description: Sign in using valid username or email.

response.name: Bad request
response.body:
{
    "timestamp": "2019-04-01T19:03:04.207+0000",
    "status": 400,
    "error": "Bad Request",
    "errors": [
        {
            "codes": [
                "NotBlank.loginRequest.usernameOrEmail",
                "NotBlank.usernameOrEmail",
                "NotBlank.java.lang.String",
                "NotBlank"
            ],
            "arguments": [
                {
                    "codes": [
                        "loginRequest.usernameOrEmail",
                        "usernameOrEmail"
                    ],
                    "arguments": null,
                    "defaultMessage": "usernameOrEmail",
                    "code": "usernameOrEmail"
                }
            ],
            "defaultMessage": "must not be blank",
            "objectName": "loginRequest",
            "field": "usernameOrEmail",
            "rejectedValue": "",
            "bindingFailure": false,
            "code": "NotBlank"
        }
    ],

    "path": "/api/auth/signin"
}

request.description: Get currently logged user basic info

response.name: OK - return content
OK - return content

request.description: Check if chosen username is available, i.e. free (true) or already taken (false)
Check if chosen email is available, i.e. free (true) or already taken (false)

Deletes all users from the database.
Requires authorization with superadmin role.

item.description:
User management endpoints
- authentication
- user info

request.description: Retrieves poll details per poll id.

response.name: Bad Request
response.body:
{
    "timestamp": "2019-04-01T18:47:20.897+0000",
    "status": 400,
    "error": "Bad Request",
    "message": "Failed to convert value of type 'java.lang.String' to required type 'java.lang.Long'; nested exception is java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: \"bad-value\"",
    "path": "/api/polls/bad-value"
}

request.description:
Retrieves all polls.
Page and size params are optional.

response.name: OK - return content

request.description:
Records a vote to chosen poll.
Requires authentication.

response.name: Bad request - already voted
response.body:
{
    "timestamp": "2019-04-01T19:24:52.490+0000",
    "status": 400,
    "error": "Bad Request",
    "message": "Sorry! You have already cast your vote in this poll",
    "path": "/api/polls/45/votes"
}

response.name: Unauthorized
response.body:
{
    "timestamp": "2019-04-01T19:26:46.672+0000",
    "status": 401,
    "error": "Unauthorized",
    "message": "Full authentication is required to access this resource",
    "path": "/api/polls/45/votes"
}

request.description:
Deletes specified poll.
Requires authorization with superadmin role.
Delete operation will be unsuccessful if there are any votes related to chosen poll id.

Deletes all polls and votes.
Requires authorization with superadmin role.

item.description:
Poll management endpoints:
- creating and listing polls
- voting and getting vote info

request.description:
Retrieves all polls.
Page and size params are optional.

response.name: OK - return content
